title: Gifted $5 of RP and it never showed up on the account
body: I gifted $5 of RP to my brother's account for his birthday, and he says he never received anything, yet I have $5 taken out of my account. I would like a reimbursement or his RP to show up on his account. Let me know what i have to do to show "proof" that I did this. Thanks

replies.body:
I went ahead and took a look at your account and find the RP gift that you sent to your brother.  From tracing the gift, it does appear that your brother received the RP and his RP total does include this gift.  If still does not see it, make sure you ask him to log out and back in which should cause him to see the updated total.

I hope this helps!  Let me know if there is still any issues!
